channel.title: Blogs on IceCereal
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on IceCereal

item.title: Init D
item.description: Okay, so I’ve been putting this off for a very long time, but it’s time I do it. I have the time, I’m bored, I’m alone in the library with no one to distract me, I have a hot cup of coffee, and I have good music playing on my headphones. I want this blog to be a place where I can jot down my ideas, make a To-Do list, and track my progress in discrete intervals of time.
